sourcesContent:
// src/components/layout/Header/Header.jsx import { Search, ShoppingCart, Menu, X, LogOut, User, Settings, Package } from 'lucide-react'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { logout } from '../../../store/slices/authSlice'; export function Header() { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); // Отримуємо дані користувача з Redux store const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.cart.items); const handleLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()); navigate('/'); }; return (
{/* Logo */}
HardwareHub
{/* Desktop Navigation */}
Home Products Contacts
{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full bg-gray-800 rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 pr-10 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-gray-300 placeholder-gray-400" />
{/* User Section */}
{cartItems.length > 0 && ( {cartItems.length} )} {user ? (
{user.isAdmin && ( Admin Panel )} My Orders
) : (
Login Register
)}
{/* Mobile Menu Button */}
{/* Mobile Menu */} {isMenuOpen && (
{/* Mobile Search */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full bg-gray-800 rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 pr-10 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
{/* Mobile Navigation */} Home Products Contacts Cart ({cartItems.length}) {/* Mobile User Section */} {user ? ( <>
Signed in as {user.firstName}
{user.isAdmin && ( Admin Panel )} My Orders ) : (
Login Register
)}
)}
); } export default Header;
